March 5, 1962
Mr. Arthur Weld
College of Communication Arts
Department of Television, Radio & Film
Michigan State University
Bast Lansing, Michigan
Dear Art:
As indicated in my mono of today, the HAEB Board will meet in
Columbus on Wednesday, May 2+
Our policy is (and haÂ© been) to pay a Board member's expenses
(if he cannot get his institution to do so) for one of our two
regular meetings each year - either the one heldTn connection with
the IERT, or the one held at the time of the MSB convention.
naturally, we hope, always, that as many as possible will be able
to get the money for both meetings from their institutions, but we
realize that this is not always possible - thus the above policy.
Looking forward to seeing you in Columbus.
Regards,
Harold E. Hill
Administrative Vice President
